participant_1.background:
I have no siblings, but I love spending time with my friends and family at our cabin in the woods on the lake.
Social media is not my thing.
i write childrens books.
i have a cat named felix and a small terrer names emmy.
i have more money than i know what to do with.

participant_2.background:
I grew up on my family's farm and learned to love the land.
i try to eat a balanced diet.
My favorite people are the ones who can appreciate my cooking.
my favorite hobby is knitting.
I live in the Midwest with my family, but I like to spend time alone sometimes.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going pretty good, thanks for asking!
No problem! I'm doing pretty well myself. I'm just relaxing at home with my pets.
That sounds nice! I'm at work right now, but I'm looking forward to getting home and relaxing.
I work at a local farm. We grow a variety of fruits and vegetables, and we also have a small shop where we sell our products.
That sounds like a really great job! I love fresh produce.
It is! I love working outdoors and getting my hands dirty.
Do you have any hobbies outside of work?
I love to cook and bake! I also enjoy knitting and crocheting.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to cook and bake too.
We should have a cooking competition sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! We can set it up for sometime next week.
Sounds good! I'll start thinking of some recipes.
